description: Looking for a comfy, lightweight all-around fleece that can handle it all? The Breathable and quick-drying Men's Reactor Polartec® Microfleece Jacket is built to be a staple for outdoor adventure seekers and everyday city slickers alike. Zippered pockets galore mean you can rock it as outerwear over a tee or flannel when you're going out, up, or all the way upside down at the crag. Flatlock seams and stretchy microfleece mean bulkless midlayer warmth for ski trips out west and wet commutes by foot or bike.
name: Marmot Reactor Polartec Jacket - Mens
